Unserviceable tank and no pipe line. Recommend
1. to clean and re plaster the internal surfaces (9 Sq.m)
2. to provide a 1m x 1m size GI mesh cover for the opening with hinges and lock.
3. Supply and lay 200m long x32 mm Dia PVC delivery pipe line and 18mm Dia x250 m long lateral pipes to houses. 50% cost contribution for pipes to be provided by the consumers.
4. Around the spring origin, make dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Agave/Areca nut trees /Kithul/Kumbuk/Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/Aththikka/Wal del/local fruits randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid interval.4. Apply mulching, organic manure and NPK fertilizer. Covered area 200 m2.

1. to demarcate and fence a strict reserve area over 5 acres
(Rs180,000)
2. To construct concrete storage tank of 20 Cu.m (size 3m x3m x2.5m) (Rs.550,000)
3. Make dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Agave/ Areca nut trees /Kithul/ Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal del/Kekuna /Mango/ local fruits/randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid interval and Apply mulching, organic manure and NPK fertilizer. Covered area 1000 Sq.m around the spring. (Rs. 535,000)
